frontmatter.title: Get directors of top 10 rated movies
frontmatter.mysql:
select distinct director 
from movies
order by rating desc
limit 10

frontmatter.title: Get career report of directors with their movie count, average ratings, minimum rating, maximum rating
Get hourly count of movie reviews
frontmatter.mysql:
select DATE_FORMAT(review_created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') as hour, count(*)
FROM movie_reviews
GROUP BY hour
ORDER BY hour;

frontmatter.title: Get count of movies without any reviews in last 7 days
frontmatter.mysql:
SELECT *
FROM 
  movies
LEFT JOIN movie_reviews
ON movies.id = movie_reviews.movie_id
AND movie_reviews.review_created_at >= DATE(NOW()) - INTERVAL 7 DAY
WHERE movie_reviews.movie_id IS NULL;

frontmatter.title: Get top 5 rated movies in each genre
frontmatter.mysql:
select genre, movie_name, rating
(SELECT 
  genre,
  movie_name,
  rating,
  RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY genre ORDER BY rating DESC) as movie_rank
FROM movies
) 
where movie_rank <= 5
ORDER BY genre, rating DESC;
